title: Online Workshop Based on Reusable Learning Modules (RLM) for Enhancing Agricultural Science Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic agricultural knowledge and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning program conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, targeting learners preparing for agricultural professional careers

learning_goals: Learners acquire and apply technical writing skills to clearly communicate agricultural science-related information.
Learners utilize RLM components (videos, quizzes, etc.) within online platforms with over 80% accuracy.
Learners design and present project-based communication strategies for solving agricultural field problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
